snippet: Former Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif has a chance to establish a credible civilian government.
abstract: Editorial welcomes election in Pakistan as repudiation of militants who are trying to overthrow the state; contends that it is up to former Prime Min Nawaz Sharif and his party, who appear to have garnered enough votes to dominate next Parliament, to prove that strong civilian leadership can turn things around in the country.
lead_paragraph: Former Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif has a chance to establish a credible civilian government.

headline.seo: Pakistan’s Election and Mr. Sharif’s Tasks
